name: Karen's New Groove [Metroidvania Jam 2023]
description:
This game was created for the itch.io metroidvania jam (month 19)

The game is not completed is only 1 level and the player has to move inside the old castle ruins avoiding obstacles and killing enemies.

The buttons to use are:

arrows to move

z or left mouse for sword attack

x or right mouse button for crossbow (after the player finds it)

left shift to become a bat (after the player finds it - the transformation lasts for a short time and has a cooldown).

We hope you will enjoy our game.
